sentences.en: A large majority of these women will have demonstrable insulin resistance.
sentences.cn: 这些患者大部分显然是胰岛素抵抗.

sentences.en: According to the rules of empirical , testable , demonstrable protocol , science says your God doesn't exist.
sentences.cn: 根据科学可测量,可测试,可演示的原则, 天主是不存在的.

sentences.en: But he does expect his philanthropy to produce some demonstrable payoff, including for his own firm.
sentences.cn: 对于他的捐赠他认为最终会有回报的, 包括有利于他的公司利益等等.

sentences.en: Demonstrable antibodies are evoked in carriers after a few weeks of infection.
sentences.cn: 在感染几星期之后,从带菌的物体中能证实存在抗体.

sentences.en: It has achieved demonstrable results, but not yet enough.
sentences.cn: 它已取得了显著成效, 但还远远不够.

sentences.en: No cavity is demonstrable ( planigrams are usually required ).
sentences.cn: 无空洞可见 ( 一般需断层摄影 ).

sentences.en: Positive credit data sharing has brought demonstrable benefits to consumers.
sentences.cn: 共用正面信贷资料为消费者带来明显益处.

sentences.en: Professor : According to Empirical , Testable, Demonstrable Protocol , Science says your GOD doesn't exist.
sentences.cn: 就可测试的科学常规方法而言, 你的上帝并不存在.

sentences.en: The road safety programme is having a demonstrable effect on road users.
sentences.cn: 道路安全方案在道路使用者身上逐渐显现出明显的效果。

sentences.en: We must provide demonstrable improvements in health services.
sentences.cn: 在公共医疗服务方面我们必须有实实在在的改进。

words.tran_cn: 示威者；论证者；指示者；证明者

trans.tran_en: able to be shown or proved
